author: TechHut
description:
Netbird is an AWESOME tool for remote connecting into devices, networks, and peers. Better yet, it's open source and they give the option to completely self-host it. No centralized VPN server with NetBird as your devices and networks connect to each other directly over a fast encrypted tunnel. Creating a high-performance point-to-point WireGuard overlay network that connects machines running anywhere in just a few clicks.

📖 RESOURCES
Website: https://netbird.io/
Github: https://github.com/netbirdio/netbird
Docs: https://docs.netbird.io/
